sourcesContent:
function ToDoListComponent() { const today = new Date() const targetDate = new Date(today.getFullYear()+12, today.getMonth(), today.getDay()) const ToDos = [ {id : 1, description :"Learn Java", status:false, targetDate:targetDate}, {id : 1, description :"Learn React", status:false, targetDate:targetDate}, {id : 1, description :"Learn Spring", status:false, targetDate:targetDate}, {id : 1, description :"Learn AWS", status:false, targetDate:targetDate}, {id : 1, description :"Learn SQL", status:false, targetDate:targetDate} ] return(

Things You need to do

{ ToDos.map( todo=> ) }
Id Description Status Target Date
{todo.id} {todo.description} {todo.status.toString()} {todo.targetDate.toDateString()}
) } export default ToDoListComponent
